data.title: Call Her Savage by [Occult, Philosophy, Illustrated Books]. Thayer, Tiffany. Illustrated by Lloyd Coe: Very Good Hardcover (1931)
data.meta_description: Hardcover - New York: Claude Kendall and Grosset & Dunlap, [1931]. - 1931 - Condition: Very Good - Octavo, (xiv), 305pp, illustrated, publisher s tan cloth lettered in brown, pictorial endpapers, top edge stained brown (small remains of a removed bookplate to ffep, edges rubbed, frays to spine ends and corners, not quite a square, tight copy, perhaps still very good). Co-founder of the Fortian Society with Theodore Dreiser, Alexander Woollcott, H.L. Mencken, etc. Thayer edited the newsletter turning it into his own personal rant sheet. Here lies a Fortean novel. - Call Her Savage
data.text:
About this Item

Octavo, (xiv), 305pp, illustrated, publisher s tan cloth lettered in brown, pictorial endpapers, top edge stained brown (small remains of a removed bookplate to ffep, edges rubbed, frays to spine ends and corners, not quite a square, tight copy, perhaps still very good). Co-founder of the Fortian Society with Theodore Dreiser, Alexander Woollcott, H.L. Mencken, etc. Thayer edited the newsletter turning it into his own personal rant sheet. Here lies a Fortean novel. Seller Inventory # 06973

Contact seller
